attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People of late have been able to claim back there charges, I say we should get rid of bank charges and make it illegal to charge for going overdrawn.!

National banks like Halifax, Lloyds, HSBC should be made to pay these charges back at once or face court action!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
